backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister managing announcements, events, staff profiles, settings, and gallery blobs with admin‑gated CRUD and publishing logic.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for several frontend files, mainly admin pages and layout components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes for public and admin pages, wrapped with theming and toaster UI.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminGate.t: Gate component that checks authentication and admin status before rendering admin content.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with status handling and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/forms/ContactFor: Client‑side‑validated contact form with demo submission confirmation.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer displaying quick links and contact info from site settings, plus a small attribution section.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Responsive site header with navigation links, admin link handling, login button, and mobile menu drawer.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Page layout wrapper that renders header, footer, and main content area.
frontend/src/components/state/ErrorSecti: Reusable error display component showing an alert with a title and message.
frontend/src/components/state/LoadingSec: Skeleton-based loading placeholder that renders a configurable number of skeleton blocks.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminContent.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating admin-managed announcements, events, staff profiles, and settings.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminStatus.ts: Checks if the current authenticated user is an admin using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/usePublicContent.ts: React Query hooks for fetching published announcements, events, staff, gallery entries, and settings.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and theme variables defining a green-and-cream light/dark color palette.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with mission, vision, core values, and school history using cards and sections.
frontend/src/pages/AcademicsPage.tsx: Displays academic information including curriculum highlights, subjects offered, and the school’s learning approach.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminAnnounceme: Admin interface to create, edit, publish, and delete announcements using dialogs and form controls.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Landing page for admin with cards linking to announcement, event, staff, gallery, and settings management sections.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminEventsPage: Admin tool for creating, editing, and deleting events, including date handling and publication toggles.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminGalleryPag: Admin page for uploading images to the gallery with progress tracking and display of existing published items.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSettingsPa: Admin page to view and edit site contact settings by loading existing values and saving updates via mutations.
Admin interface for creating, editing, and deleting staff profiles with dialog-based form handling.
frontend/src/pages/AdmissionsPage.tsx: Shows admissions details such as eligibility, required documents, and current admission status alerts.
frontend/src/pages/AnnouncementsPage.tsx: Fetches and displays published announcements with loading and error states and fallback messaging.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Provides contact details from site settings and includes a form for sending messages.
frontend/src/pages/EventsPage.tsx: Fetches and lists school events with date formatting, upcoming indicators, and error/loading handling.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Loads and displays gallery images with responsive grid layout and handles loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Public homepage showing hero banner, feature cards, and recent announcements, events, staff, and gallery previews loaded from hooks.
frontend/src/pages/StaffPage.tsx: Displays published staff profiles with avatars, bios, and contact info, handling loading and error states.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, animations, and loaded plugins.
project_state.json: Metadata file describing project state, existing features, requirements, and versioning info.
